article_title: New Funds for Virtual Tours Firm
article_text:
Startup company View the Space Inc., which creates virtual commercial-property tours and collects leasing data for landlords, has landed a $7 million round of venture financing that will allow it to expand into additional markets and beef up the next generation of its product.

The new financing, which the New York-based company expects to announce Monday, will come mostly from Trinity Ventures, a Menlo Park, Calif.-based...
